text:
Jonathan Michaels is a British financial advisor, author, and founder of IVA Advice.
Biography.
He was born in 1984 and educated at Staffordshire University. Jonathan Michaels is a CII Advanced Diploma Financial Advisor with over 15 years of experience and has worked with different Financial Conduct Authority regulated finance companies. He is a member of the Civil Enforcement Association and the High Court Enforcement Officers Association. He has written extensively on financial services matters of the United Kingdom.
